description: http://anidb.net/ch83473 [Illyasviel von Einzbern], her soul extracted from http://anidb.net/ch83955 [her body] by http://anidb.net/ch81975 [Angelica] and placed into a http://anidb.net/ch83943 [teddy bear], then further transforming into a http://anidb.net/t2503 [magical girl] teddy, http://anidb.net/ch54377 [Sapphire] version.
name: Prisma Illya
